subject: Create Control Plane API Service
description:
Create standalone Control Plane API service at /home/ken/control-plane-api/ as the authoritative API for all governance. Structure:
- Next.js API routes project
- /projects - Project CRUD, lifecycle
- /orgs - Organization management  
- /keys - API key CRUD, rotation, MCP types
- /usage - Usage tracking, quotas
- /jobs - Job management
- /audit - Audit log access
- /webhooks - Webhook management
- /internal/snapshot - Source of truth contract (CRITICAL)
- /internal/health - Service health reporting

Includes shared auth.ts and db.ts libraries.
